_header: Though our Lord God in Trinity had all things wrought
_description: Allegory, the Rebellion of Pride and Envy her daughter — 114 lines in couplets

PierpontM957.First Lines:
Þo oure lord god in trinite hadde al þyng wrouȝtAnd
                    þourȝ his owene þoufte to gode ende y
                    brouȝt…
PierpontM957.Last Lines:
…Mote in heuene y se þourȝ help of MarieAmen Amen so
                    mote it be sigget bnde and frye
PierpontM957.Editions:
Historical Manuscripts Commission, Sixth Report, with Appendix.
         (1877-78): App., 319.
